posts.description: OpenShot Video Editor - Open-source video editor
Keygen - a dead-simple software licensing API built for developers
posts.extended:
Save your business time and money using our Licensing as a Service
+ Easily sell, license and distribute your desktop/server software by utilizing our powerful licensing and distribution APIs.
+ Ship faster and save time (and money!) by not building a licensing server in-house that can't meet the growing requirements of your product.

The Internet generation needs organizations that reflect who we are; where anybody can contribute to a shared mission; where leaders can easily change; and where money flows in full transparency. Create an Open Collective for your community.
Old Skool finger command for the new age. Retrieves GitHub status message for a user.
